name: Endless Sky (itch)
description:
Dodge the traps and Go the furthest !

Endless Sky is an endless horizontal platformer scroller. Your score is increase by the number of your platform. You need to break the meteors by touching them to prevent platforms from being destroyed.  But beware of the various traps that will be on your way ! Don't worry, some items are there to help you. Make the best score and challenge your friends !

The game can be played with controller or keybord.

Items :

  •     Extra Life: Add an extra life.
  •    Gold Extra Life: Give back your max life and add an extra life.
  •    Platforms: Add two new platforms.
  •    Platforms repair: Give back all your platforms.
  •       Dash: Now you can dash!
  •    Fly: Now you can plane !
  •    Smash the ground: Now you can smash the ground!

It's a little game made with the heart on free time. Hope you will enjoy and I look forward to read some your feedback.

If you want support me, share the game with all your friends. And download the mobile version to have the game wherever you go!

Please follow me on twitter to see future projects: https://twitter.com/Bengiskhan4
